snippet: Colorado health officials launched a $2 million "Don't Be a Lab Rat" advertising campaign on Monday, aimed at warning young people about the risks marijuana use has on their developing brains....

headline.print_headline: Colorado Unveils 'Don't Be a Lab Rat' Ads to Curb Teen Pot Use
headline.main: Colorado Unveils 'Don't Be a Lab Rat' Ads to Curb Teen Pot Use

lead_paragraph: Colorado health officials launched a $2 million "Don't Be a Lab Rat" advertising campaign on Monday, aimed at warning young people about the risks marijuana use has on their developing brains.
